translations: v．猪叫声：模仿猪发出的声音。

sentences.sentence: While many Gamorreans understand alien languages, their voice boxes permit them only to speak in their native tongue of grunts, oinks and squeals.
sentences.translation: 很多加莫人听得懂外星语，但他们的声腔只能发出母语中的咕噜声和尖号。

sentences.sentence: Pigs communicate constantly with one another and more than 20 of their oinks have been identified for different situations, from wooing their mates to saying "I'm hungry".
sentences.translation: 猪与猪之间彼此沟通交流，会根据情况发出20多种不同的叫声，包括向伴侣求爱和向自己的伴侣说“我饿了”。
